# Voice Assistant App - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Android communication app for users who cannot speak, featuring Arabic Egyptian dialect text-to-speech.
App provides category-based phrase buttons for building sentences and speaking them using Android TTS.

## Project Structure
- `/app/src/main/java/com/voiceassist/` - Kotlin source code
  - `MainActivity.kt` - Main activity with UI logic
  - `TextToSpeechManager.kt` - TTS integration
  - `Phrase.kt` - Data models
- `/app/src/main/res/` - Resources (layouts, strings, colors)
- `/app/build.gradle.kts` - App dependencies and config
- `README.md` - Full documentation in Arabic
- `QUICK_START.md` - Quick start guide
- `CUSTOMIZATION_GUIDE.md` - How to customize the app

## Key Features
✅ Text-to-Speech in Egyptian Arabic
✅ Category-based phrases (Basic Needs, Feelings, Responses, Questions)
✅ Sentence builder - select multiple words
✅ Large accessible buttons
✅ RTL support for Arabic
✅ Simple UI for elderly users
